description.en: Programming and designing new apps for iOS in Swift and Objective-C language.

description.en: I assist on course PB161 C++ Programming and PV112 Computer Graphics API in preparation of programming assignments, help students during seminars, answer their questions and score and give feedback on major course assignments.

description.en: Preparing images, documents or presentations for translations to multiple languages. Fixing and finalizing complete translated materials.
